function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Devastating global economic fallout from covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pressure on corporations to reevaluate globalized supply chain systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic inequality leading to unequal access to resources such as stable homes, internet, and technology","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased exposure to contagious diseases for individuals in lower income brackets due to employment in service or delivery sectors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequitable access to online learning resources for lower income individuals, exacerbating educational disparities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to prioritize human health in sustainability goals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global pandemic as a result of neglecting public health","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Separation of health from other sustainability goals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of respiratory pandemics like covid-19 in urban settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of communicable diseases in ’healthy urban planning’ literature and policy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integration of health and wellbeing dimensions in urban planning","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission within and between cities and city regions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social and economic consequences of implementing public health measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of literature reviews on the connection between npis and urban planning and design in the context of pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in fitting broad urban planning and design concepts into systematic review approaches for npis in pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Less stringent approach to reviewing the literature, such as rapid reviews, leading to scope for heterogeneity in the employment of rapid reviews","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Examination of multi-disciplinary literature on how planning and designing cities intersects with pandemics of infectious respiratory diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limiting search terms based on authors’ personal interests may lead to overlooking important aspects of the intersection between pandemics and urban planning.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid review process may result in overlooking key studies and relevant literature, leading to biased conclusions and recommendations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of formal quality appraisal tool used in the review","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Considerable overlap between themes and papers crossing themes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Connection allocation based on reviewers’ interests and areas of expertise","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inclusion and exclusion criteria for research may not cover all relevant urban contexts related to pandemics of respiratory diseases, leading to a limited scope of the study.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Articles focused on covid-19, spanish influenza, h1n1, and generic ’influenza’ or ’pandemic influenza’ increase the risk of propagating contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusion of multiple international contexts, including developed and lmic contexts, increases the risk of global disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of explicit inclusion of equity considerations in the literature review may perpetuate health disparities and lead to unequal access to healthcare resources.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of infectious diseases through travel","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate urban planning for infectious disease containment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in office and residential buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective health and safety management in residential apartment buildings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate urban design for open public spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient governance and stakeholder engagement in pandemic-focused urban planning","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective pandemic responses at the local government level","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of institutional coordination across multiple agencies and different jurisdictions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ethical issues related to communicating risks and responses","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Allocation of scarce resources in socioeconomically different urban areas","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparency and public understanding in decision making","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Oversimplification of biological systems in mathematical models","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airports identified as efficient but expensive for controlling infection spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of npis dependent on urban planning and design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variable success of npis in different cities and countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases in urban settings due to population density","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequities faced by different social groups in urban settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear relationship between population density and infectious disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Connectivity between districts impacting mortality during influenza pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effect of density and npis on infection rates","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of socioeconomic factors on pandemic spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spatial disparities in transport infrastructure correlated with h1n1 outbreak impacts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High density residential areas linked to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 due to air pollution-to-human transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
